data.text: @BazzarApril @WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 Let's wait three years while millions more die.

@BazzarApril @WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 I love dipshits that cite survival rates.  Literally millions of people have died and tens of millions been very ill.  But yeah, let's not vaccinate against that. It's literally the point of vaccinations
@thepoobah @WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 Only for other illness right? This one is special with its 99.97% survival rate. Gotcha. 👌

@WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 Note: being in trial status is standard operating procedure for ANY vaccine.  Unfortunately we have a ongoing pandemic which required emergency use authorization.  We can't wait three years to find out if this is "safe" while millions die
@WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 Im absolutely against any type of vaccine passport or vaccine only situation. I don't think there's a lot of traction for it luckily
@thepoobah @killa_cam214 I wish more people who have had the shot and feel as you do that would stand with us publicly more
@WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 I don't think it is a problem though

@thepoobah @killa_cam214 Still in trials till past 2022. That’s enough for me to be hesitant, not to mention the other concerns. It shouldn’t be a problem that some prefer to wait and/or abstain altogether
@WyrdGrl @killa_cam214 We are way past the first group of trial subjects. Over 2 Billion shots have been administered worldwide (that includes all the vaccines)

@thepoobah @killa_cam214 Even if I had multiple risk factors I would not be rushing to be in the first group of trial subjects for this shot. They should encourage and that’s it, but you’ve seen they are already heading towards punitive measures

@killa_cam214 @WyrdGrl Depends on your risk factor. Clearly the vaccine works and is so far very safe based on what we are seeing.  Personally I think we should encourage those over 40 to get vaccinated.  Not sure we should be too worried about younger folks since adverse outcome with covid are so rare
@killa_cam214 Did you see any of darkhorse today? Terrifying. https://t.co/zlC8UaDXX2

“We must overthrow Saddam for the good of humanity and the Iraqi people”

*creates ISIL*

“We must take the vaccine to save the human race”

*fertility rates drop* https://t.co/Ge95DlMEQY
